snippet: In the stock market’s summer rally, investors have again been taking risks — but more selectively than in past such rebounds.
abstract: Paul J Lim Fundamentally column observes that in the stock market’s summer 2012 rally, investors have again been taking risks--but more selectively than in past such rebounds.
lead_paragraph: In the stock market’s summer rally, investors have again been taking risks — but more selectively than in past such rebounds.

headline.seo: Investors Are Taking Thoughtful Risks in This Rebound
headline.main: A Market Rebound That’s Defying Old Rules
headline.print_headline: A Rebound That’s Defying the Old Rules
